articles.title: Ukraine power plant shelled again, Zelenskiy rails at Russian 'nuclear terror' - Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine said on Sunday that renewed Russian shelling had damaged three radiation sensors and hurt a worker at the Zaporizhzhia power plant, in the second hit in consecutive days on Europe's largest nuclear facility.

articles.title: Second World War bomb revealed in drought-hit Italy's River Po - CBC News
articles.description: Heat waves sweeping Europe this summer have brought not just record high temperatures and scorched fields: The drought-stricken waters of Italy's River Po are running so low they revealed a previously submerged World War Two bomb.
